about_the_game:
Key Gameplay Features:

1️⃣ Drag and Drop: Place objects strategically to set the path for the bomb ball.

2️⃣ Rotate and Position: Fine-tune your setup by rotating and placing objects in the perfect spot.

3️⃣ Aim and Shoot: Launch the bomb ball and watch it destroy the Marine's building.

Pirates of Justice is an exciting puzzle game that challenges you to think strategically and solve problems to help pirates overthrow the corrupt Marine. In a world where the government protects a privileged few while disregarding the lives of ordinary people, it's up to you to fight for justice and dismantle the Marine's oppressive control.

Each level tests your creativity and skills as you guide the pirate's bomb ball to destroy the Marine's buildings. With increasing difficulty and an engaging storyline of rebellion, Pirates of Justice offers a thrilling puzzle experience.

Why Play Pirates of Justice?

  • Strategic Gameplay: Solve intricate puzzles by placing, rotating, and shooting objects.

  • Immersive Storyline: Rebel against injustice and fight for those the government abandoned.

  • Progressive Challenges: Face increasingly complex puzzles as you rise through the pirate ranks.

  • Dynamic Level Design: Each level introduces unique obstacles to conquer.

  • Bounty System: Raise your pirate bounty with each victory and edge closer to becoming the King of the Pirates.

Set sail on a journey of rebellion and strategy. Do you have what it takes to bring justice to the oppressed and earn your place in pirate history? Play Pirates of Justice now!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or later) or any GPU that supports OpenGL 3.3 or later
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated audio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 1.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better), DirectX 10 or OpenGL 3.3 compatible.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card or onboard audio (compatible with DirectX or OpenAL).
  • VR Support: Not supported.
